Query.Sentence: WITH T AS ( WITH AVAILABLE_PILOTS AS ( SELECT PS.PIL_ID, UCP.UCP_ID, UCP.UCP_DATE_SOLD, UCP.UC_ID FROM PILOTS PS LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON PS.PIL_ID = UCP.PIL_ID WHERE UCP.UCP_DATE_SOLD IS NOT NULL ) SELECT UC.COMP_ID, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, APS.PIL_ID, APS.UCP_ID FROM AVAILABLE_PILOTS APS LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON APS.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID #WHERE# ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PILOTS P LEFT JOIN T ON P.PIL_ID = T.PIL_ID #ORDER#;

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PILOTS P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UC.COMP_ID, PS.PIL_ID AS PIL, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, UCP.UCP_ID, UCP.UCP_DATE_SOLD FROM PILOTS PS LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON PS.PIL_ID = UCP.PIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID #WHERE# AND UCP.UCP_DATE_SOLD IS NULL) T ON P.PIL_ID = T.PIL #ORDER#;
SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP INNER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID #WHERE#
